text: The Bad Thoughts Episodes 1-6 release date and time are just around the corner, and viewers are anxious to learn all the details, such as the streaming service the series will be available on. Led by Tom Segura, Bad Thoughts is a comedy series exploring disturbing stories that see characters face situations where the limits of their decency and ethical boundaries are tested. Here’s all you need to know about Bad Thoughts Episodes 1-6’s release date and time. When is the Bad Thoughts Episodes 1-6 release date & time? The episodes’ release date is May 13, 2025, and their release time is 12 a.m. Pacific Time (PT) and 3 a.m. Eastern Time (ET). Check out its release times in the U.S. below: TimezoneRelease DateRelease TimeEastern TimeMay 13, 202503:00 a.m.Pacific TimeMay 13, 202512:00 a.m. Bad Thoughts’ ensemble talent includes Segura, Robert Iler, Dani Hurtado, Arnold Chun, Kira Spencer Cook, Alexis Abrams, Norma Jean, Lucas McCutchen, Bob Pack, Hannah Bittick, Sean Middleton, John Gholson, Brett Baggerly, and David Piggott. Where to watch Bad Thoughts Episodes 1-6 You can watch Bad Thoughts Episodes 1-6 via Netflix. Netflix is a popular streaming service, boasting a wide variety of films, television shows, animated series, and documentaries, which include both original projects and licensed content. However, the streamer is most famous for its original shows and movies, which include titles like Extraction, Money Heist, Virgin River, and The Witcher. What is Bad Thoughts about? Bad Thoughts follows multiple disturbing stories of characters struggling with moral decency and finding themselves in situations greatly tempting them to embrace bad thoughts, tendencies, habits, and feelings. The official synopsis for Bad Thoughts is as follows: “A collection of hilariously disturbing stories that push the boundaries of decency in ways only Tom Segura could imagine.”

The Bad Thoughts Episodes 1-6 release date and time are just around the corner, and viewers are anxious to learn all the details, such as the streaming service the series will be available on. Led by Tom Segura, Bad Thoughts is a comedy series exploring disturbing stories that see characters face situations where the limits of their decency and ethical boundaries are tested.

Here’s all you need to know about Bad Thoughts Episodes 1-6’s release date and time.

When is the Bad Thoughts Episodes 1-6 release date & time?

The episodes’ release date is May 13, 2025, and their release time is 12 a.m. Pacific Time (PT) and 3 a.m. Eastern Time (ET).

Check out its release times in the U.S. below:

Bad Thoughts’ ensemble talent includes Segura, Robert Iler, Dani Hurtado, Arnold Chun, Kira Spencer Cook, Alexis Abrams, Norma Jean, Lucas McCutchen, Bob Pack, Hannah Bittick, Sean Middleton, John Gholson, Brett Baggerly, and David Piggott.

Where to watch Bad Thoughts Episodes 1-6

You can watch Bad Thoughts Episodes 1-6 via Netflix.

Netflix is a popular streaming service, boasting a wide variety of films, television shows, animated series, and documentaries, which include both original projects and licensed content. However, the streamer is most famous for its original shows and movies, which include titles like Extraction, Money Heist, Virgin River, and The Witcher.

What is Bad Thoughts about?

Bad Thoughts follows multiple disturbing stories of characters struggling with moral decency and finding themselves in situations greatly tempting them to embrace bad thoughts, tendencies, habits, and feelings.

The official synopsis for Bad Thoughts is as follows:

“A collection of hilariously disturbing stories that push the boundaries of decency in ways only Tom Segura could imagine.”
